value.value: A transcriptional regulator prz1 phosphorylated form that is hyperphosphorylated under conditions where calcineurin is not active.
A transcriptional regulator prz1 phosphorylated 1 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

definition.value: Category=organism-modification. Requested by=PomBase. Kinase=("Cmk1"; PR:Q9P7I2; RxxS/T motifs).

value.value: An interferon regulatory factor 5 isoform 1 that has been K63-linked polyubiquitinated in response to TLR/MyD88-dependent signaling. Ubiquitinated by TRAF6. Example: UniProtKB:P56477-1, Lys-410/Lys-411, PR:000044772.
An interferon regulatory factor 5 isoform 1 K63-polyubiquitinated 1 in mouse. UniProtKB:P56477-1, Lys-410/Lys-411, PR:000044772.
An interferon regulatory factor 5 complex that is a homodimer of mouse phosphorylated IRF5 isoform 1.
An interferon regulatory factor 5 complex that is a homodimer of mouse phosphorylated IRF5 isoform 2.
A protein that is a translation product of the Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h- ste11 gene or a 1:1 ortholog thereof.
A transcription factor ste11 that has not been subjected to any co- or post-translational residue modification or peptide bond cleavage.

label.value: transcription factor ste11 unmodified form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A transcription factor ste11 unmodified form in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

A transcription factor ste11 phosphorylated form in which the phosphorylation occurs at the consensus recognition sequence for 14-3-3. Example: UniProtKB:P36631, Thr-173, MOD:00047|Ser-218, MOD:00046.
A transcription factor ste11 phosphorylated 1 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Phosphorylated by Pat1 kinase. Example: UniProtKB:P36631, Thr-173, MOD:00047|Ser-218, MOD:00046.
A transcription factor ste11 that includes at least one phosphorylated residue.
A histone H2A that is a translation product of the yeast HTA2 gene or a 1:1 ortholog thereof.

definition.value: Category=gene. Requested by=PomBase. This protein is called histone H2A-beta in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

value.value: A core histone that is a translation product of one of the H2A gene variants. It is a core histone and contains a copy of the Histone (Pfam:PF00125) domain.
A histone H2A.2 that has not been subjected to any co- or post-translational residue modification or peptide bond cleavage.
A histone H2A.2 unmodified form in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

A histone H2A.2 phosphorylated form in which the phosphorylation occurs within the [ST]Q motif at the C-terminus that constitutes a recognition sequence for kinases from the PI3/PI4-kinase family. Phosphorylated in response to DNA double-strand breaks generated by exogenous genotoxic agents and by stalled replication forks. Example: UniProtKB:P04910, Ser-128, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A.2 phosphorylated 1 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Phosphorylation motif is SQE. UniProtKB:P04910, Ser-128, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A.2 that includes at least one phosphorylated residue.
A histone H2A.2 phosphorylated 1 in yeast. Phosphorylation motif is SQE. UniProtKB:P04912, Ser-129, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A.2 unmodified form in yeast.

A histone H2A.2 phosphorylated form in which the phosphorylation occurs at the Ser or Thr residue within the LLPKx[ST] motif by the mitotic checkpoint serine/threonine-protein kinase BUB1. Example: UniProtKB:P04910, Ser-122, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A.2 phosphorylated 2 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Example: UniProtKB:P04910, Ser-122, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A that is a translation product of the Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h- hta1 gene or a 1:1 ortholog thereof.

definition.value: Category=gene. Requested by=PomBase. This protein is called histone H2A-alpha in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

value.value: A histone H2A-alpha that lacks phosphorylated residues.
A histone H2A-alpha unphosphorylated form in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.
A histone H2A-alpha that includes at least one phosphorylated residue.

A histone H2A-alpha phosphorylated form in which the phosphorylation occurs within the [ST]Q motif at the C-terminus that constitutes a recognition sequence for kinases from the PI3/PI4-kinase family. Phosphorylated in response to DNA double-strand breaks generated by exogenous genotoxic agents and by stalled replication forks. Example: UniProtKB:P04909, Ser-129, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A-alpha phosphorylated 1 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Phosphorylation motif is SQE. Example: UniProtKB:P04909, Ser-129, MOD:00046.

A histone H2A-alpha phosphorylated form in which the phosphorylation occurs at the Ser or Thr residue within the LLPKx[ST] motif by the mitotic checkpoint serine/threonine-protein kinase BUB1. Example: UniProtKB:P04909, Ser-122, MOD:00046.
A histone H2A-alpha phosphorylated 2 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Example: UniProtKB:P04909, Ser-122, MOD:00046.
A protein that is a translation product of the Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h- mei2 gene or a 1:1 ortholog thereof.
A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2 that is a translation product of the hht1 gene in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.
A histone H3 that is a translation product of the Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h- hht1 or hht2 genes, 1:1 orthologs thereof, or a semi-ortholog thereof in fungi.

definition.value: Category=gene. Requested by=PomBase. Note: The Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h- hht1 and hht2 genes encode identical proteins.

value.value: A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2 that is a translation product of the hht2 gene in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.

label.value: fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed form

value.value: A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2 that has had the initiator methionine removed.

label.value: histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.1 (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that has had the initiator methionine removed. Example: UniProtKB:P09988, 2-136.

label.value: fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed phosphorylated form

value.value: A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed form that includes at least one phosphorylated residue.

label.value: histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed phosphorylated 1 (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that has been phosphorylated by Haspin. Example: UniProtKB:P09988, 2-136, Thr-4, MOD:00047.

definition.value: Category=organism-modification. Requested by=PomBase. Note that this form is referred to as H3-pT3, because the initial methionine is not counted.

label.value: fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed methylated form

value.value: A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed form that includes at least one methylated residue.

label.value: histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed K9-methylated form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that has been methylated on Lys-9. Example: UniProtKB:P09988, 2-136, Lys-10, MOD:00663.

definition.value: Category=organism-modification. Requested by=PomBase. This form is recognized by the HP1-like protein Swi6 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Note that in the article cited the residue number is different because the initial methionine is not counted.

label.value: histone H3.2, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.2 (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that has had the initiator methionine removed. Example: UniProtKB:P09988, 2-136.

label.value: fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed unphosphorylated form

value.value: A fungal histone H3.1/H3.2, initiator methionine removed form that lacks phosphorylated residues.
A meiosis protein mei2 that has not been subjected to any co- or post-translational residue modification or peptide bond cleavage.

label.value: meiosis protein mei2 unmodified form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A meiosis protein mei2 unmodified form in Schizosaccharomyces pombe.
A meiosis protein mei2 that includes at least one phosphorylated residue.
A meiosis protein mei2 phosphorylated form that has been post-translationally modified by Pat1 kinase.
A meiosis protein mei2 phosphorylated 1 in Schizosaccharomyces pombe. Phosphorylated by Pat1 kinase. Example: UniProtKB:P08965, Ser-438, MOD:00046|Thr-527, MOD:00047.

label.value: histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed unphosphorylated form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.1, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that lacks phosphorylated residues.

label.value: histone H3.2, initiator methionine removed unphosphorylated form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe)

value.value: A histone H3.2, initiator methionine removed form (Schizosaccharomyces pombe) that lacks phosphorylated residues.
